card_text: 2 or more Reptile-Type "Worm" monsters$NFor each Fusion Material Monster with a different name used to Fusion Summon this card, it gains 500 ATK, and also gains these effects:$N●2+: Once per turn, you can select 1 Reptile-Type monster in your Graveyard, and Special Summon it in face-down Defense Position.$N●4+: You can remove from play 1 Reptile-Type monster from your Graveyard to send 1 monster on the field to the Graveyard.$N●6+: Once per turn, you can draw 1 card.
